overview: BETX On The Road: DMV Sponsored by Nissan 7pm @ The Fillmore Wednesday, July 26th Featuring WALE & Special Guest Ari Lennox This year, we will keep the BET Experience going as we take the show on the road to the DMV. We will add some FIRE to your summer FUN with an unforgetable concert by one of D.C.'s finest - Wale & Ari Lennox  Stay Tuned
title: BET EXPERIENCE 2017 On The Road
